title: Spaceman1000$
author: Spaceman1000$
content: President Bola Tinubu shakes the entire security sector, as he retires all service chiefs.Omo presido, don ask for immediate replacement of this security chiefs, BABA just dey touch all the sectors way dey important small small, him don first remove CBN GOVERNOR, EFCC BOSS, now na all the security chiefs.My people, how Una see dis matter.https://twitter.com/NTANewsNow/status/1670862583530651663?t=vsT64l_jkDh-v8cR194MlQ&s=19

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Currently breaking news is going on AIT that President Tinubu has changed all the service Chiefs in Nigeria. Just fine turn you channels to AIT now and you will see everything clear. Let us see weti go happened for their government. E bi like sae he go do well for the country. But all what I need is the reduction of cost living.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Ahmed Tinubu 3 weeks in office bring some changes in our security sector that made them to be more function in their duty in different department. I believe president Tinubu is doing well by removed CBN governor and EFCC boss, and he is still ready to remove some that will give him bad name in the future. If president Ahmed Tinubu Can really fight this corrupted people well in the country, I think our economy that is trying to collapse will return back to life again, because the huge amount of money our security agency found in past CBN governor house today will reach Nigeria to lay a good foundation for our economy.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on June 19, 2023, 07:19:01 PMBut all what I need is the reduction of cost living. Inflation that has occurred already is hard to reverse because deflation too has its own negative effect on economy, but what that matters most are increasing rate of employment, having good standard of living, reduction of people living below the poverty line, more export, increase in GDP and having a better economy growth and development in a way that more people can be able to afford the cost of living in a better way.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: This life na turn by turn. Every government get their own people wet them go put for power so that them go fit work together. The former administration wet be Buhari and him kabal time don pass. Now na Tinubu turn so he must remove all the important offices and appointment from the people wet dey for the former administration so that he mind go rest and them go fit work together. After all the security sector dey very weak because of corruption and self desires of the chiefs in power. Security na e b the strength of a country but our own na them be the wolfs of the country. Tinubu go still change many vital position holders for the country.

comments.body: Nah positive step be this and like wetin @CryptoHeadline tok, e no gud to continue with old faces if your aim na to change corruption. But I hope say these ones e put no go worse pass d old ones? Especially Ribadu, I still dey look e appointment with crook eye as na former EFCC chairman, Police officer e bin be.  Well, make we believe say some of this acting officers go help make the country better.

Him wan put all him loyalist for the positions dem so nobody fot mumu where him dey. As him dey put him loyalist dem, I just hope say dem go work oh even though dem wan share the money because if dem no work na big fuvk up be dat. Another thing wey for justify this him recent actions na say, none of the service chief dey work because we still dey get insecurities everywhere so him dey right to removed them. Na so so incompetent people bee fully this offices. Make tinubu no go put mumu loyalist sha, make dem be people wey go make this governments to sweet.Tinubu no come play for this office oh, I no go surprised if the man hold the country hostage even when him comfort seat as him just hold Lagos state for pocket wey be say na him dey deliver other successors coming after him. Sha me self no go reason am if the people him dey put dey show working and the country dey go ahead ahead. Like play like play, we go just dey one day hear say dem dun dey comot chief judges and other higher judges for the country. Na that time our eye go clear say this man no wan here say him get problem for this office wey him dey so.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I no dey surprise for the changes wey Mr. President dey effect. That na the first thing every smart politician go do when them smell office power. Their cronies and lackeys  and their henchmen naim dem dey put for office make dem lap dem. See, at first, those security chiefs don fail Nigerians. Under their watch alot of atrocities were committed and the culprits all walked away with it freely.I just believe say the changes wey Nigerians dey pray for dey around the corner and the change possibly they sweep across all parastatals. Mr. President is not wrong in what ever he is doing. This is just the beginning. Let us watch and see how it goes.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Tinubu no d delay in shifting and changing ground since wey em enter office. Only em 3 weeks in office em don take bold step pass the former governments wey put us for this insecurity and economic mess wey we d so. I never knew sae Tinubu go get em government rolling in such a manner in short interval by changing and appointing new people wey go work with am without delay. This shows that em d ready to correct and put things in order for the betterment of the Nigeria citizens. If to sae na just a tenure wey em go rule, make Nigeria talk good about am at the end.This is a commendable move by Tinubu to replace those service chiefs wey the office the play politics and collect bribe nothing much. At least this newly appointed service chiefs wey Tinubu appoints now, go now strategize how them go find a lasting solution on how to counter Boko haram and the insecurity problem wey the hover around the country. A big bravo to Tinubu. Em don show Nigerians wetin em mean to be a Commanding in Chief of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. You don't delay in making appointments and signing new bills into laws

There isn't a set budget for security, and when it comes to banditry, the chefs are aware, therefore I believe that politics is at play here as well as another way for them to make money. I was very happy with Mr presidents action.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: This was expected and didn't come as a surprise to many Nigerians bith home and abroad reason being that almost all in all administrations when power change hands the first area they focus on is reshuffling of security chiefs or retiring of the unwanted cabals in the military placing their loyalist at the apex of command. But what ever may, we only hope to see a better security improvement in the country based on this. My only fear about this present government is that they have no blueprint plan for the country so everything would all be on a spontaneous occurrence from the government to her citizens and at the end of the day we would have nothing to hold them for as a promise they never fulfilled in their blueprint.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Spaceman1000$ on June 19, 2023, 07:13:19 PMOmo presido, don ask for immediate replacement of this security chiefs, BABA just dey touch all the sectors way dey important small small, him don first remove CBN GOVERNOR, EFCC BOSS, now na all the security chiefs.My people, how Una see dis matter.I do not know so much appoint the new security chiefs appointment so as to speak authoritatively on the matter. However, what I do know is that it is good for there to be a change in those offices, to shake things up, boost morale of the employees, give room to others to play their role in nation building through infusing of new ideas. It really doesn't matter about the religion or ethnic group. What matters is that they were appointed based on merit. One of my wishes is that if something can be done about those people in the house of assembly and house of representatives who have been there for too way too long, who go from becoming a governor to senator and from senator to other kinds of appointments while an average Nigerian students are just suffering, I would be happy about it.
